message:
iqraaly is looking for a Technical Lead / CTO.

Whoever is interested and fits the criteria below should apply here or email me directly his/her CV.

The requirement is simply:
- experience in mobile application development (Android and/or iOS) is a must
- experience in web products front- and back-end is a must, PHP preferred
- experience in leading teams and positive feedback about him/her is a must
- 5 years+ work experience is preferred

If you can recommend someone - please do and please contact me about him/her.

email: abdelrahman@iqraaly.com, subject "Lead Developer"
name: Job: Lead Web/Mobile Apps Developer at Innovolve in Cairo, Egypt
caption: wuzzuf.net
description: Innovolve is hiring! Join WUZZUF to apply to jobs at Innovolve and many other jobs in Cairo, Egypt.
